March 20-22, 2017

The disability community has proven time and time again that when we join together, amazing things happen! Join fellow advocates in Washington, D.C. for the 2017 Disability Policy Seminar to strengthen your grassroots advocacy and connect with your representatives on the issue that matter most to you.

The event is packed with informative sessions from experts in the field, and opportunities to discuss key issues with others from your state. Join us to get informed, connected, and ready to protect the things that matter most. Register today!
